member.name: M:InstaTransfer.BLL.Models.Validation.RequireNonDefaultAttribute.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Override of
member.returns: false if the is equal the default value of an instance of its own type.
member.remarks: Is meant for use with primitive types or structs like DateTime, Guid, etc. Specifically ignores null values so that it can be combined with RequiredAttribute. Should not be used with Strings.
